views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10, 11 and 12

* Reduce the huge amount of background blur.
* Ignore the force touch recognition (makes 3d-touch faster and smoother)
* Remove the separators.
* Flip all 3d-touch menu icons to the left.
* Reverse all items order.
* Cool effect for the SB icon when 3d-touching.
* Disable Animations for 3d-touch menus.
* Ignore first touch (so that you don’t hit an item by mistake)
* Square menu option.
* Split widgets option “buggy”
* Configure options from settings.
* No need to respring to apply changes.

- iOS 12 Support. 
- Cephei is no longer a dependency (as many people were having issues accessing the prefs)
